text:
Schemas for MySQL and Postgres may not allow unicode in URIs. For SQLServer this
issue has been solved
creator: ozeigermann@c1-fse.de

text:
In case of confusion: I meant the string that results from decoding an URI
specifying a resource might not fit into the database schema if this string
contains non-ASCII characters.
creator: ozeigermann@c1-fse.de
